pages.text: Increases spell range and AOE by 10% and blesses the caster and all affected teammates with the Blessed status effect, adding armor and reducing incoming damage. This modifier is unique to the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/witches_orb)Witches Orb,$() to obtain it you must craft your orb using the appropriate aspect gem.

pages.mod_text: Your orb focuses the blessed energy of the gem within, shielding you from harm as you channel magic through it. Appears on a Witches Orb if crafted with the proper gem.
